original_title: i don't know how, but i don't think i'm alone
overview: "i wanted to make something horror adjacent when it came time for halloween. i had several ideas but many proved to be too complex to do by myself. i instead stuck to what i knew, stretched my editing, framing and lighting abilities and hopefully made something that is beautiful yet off putting, just in time for the season. i hope you enjoy it." -lucille, october 2021
title: i don't know how, but i don't think i'm alone
